reviewText: As a soloist, I have loved and sung her music for years, it is amazing, Spirit-filled and powerful.  But her CD's are just the most wonderful blessing, what an anointed singer!
WHAT A VOICE--RIGHT FROM THE HEART OF GOD.  LISTEN TO IT OVER-AND-OVER-AND-OVER AGAIN,  THANK GOD FOR THIS WOMAN.
She has a wonderful voice and a good message to go with it.  She exudes sincerity and talent.

My husband and I just viewed the DVD last night and, as always, we were thrilled with the performance of this very talented lady.  My favorites on this musical DVD are: HE'S BEEN FAITHFUL, IN THE PRESENCE OF JEHOVAH, & I AM NOT ASHAMED OF THE GOSPEL.  She takes time between songs to offer encouragement.  She tells some things about her own life and adds humor, as well.  I will be buying some more of these for family members because of the quality, the content, and the testimony.
